name: Spirit Ranch
description:
Fight your way through waves of vengeful outlaw spirits but using your trusty whip! Get as many points as possible before your enemies make you bite the dust.

Move around the underworld with WASD, and use the mouse to aim your whip. Hold down the left mouse button to ready your strike, and release it to strike! 

----------

Spirit Ranch is a short arcade game made for School at Champlain College. It's made in Unity, using Illustrator for the art and SunVox for the sounds and music. 

The game is free! Donations are appreciated but not required. You can play on both Mac and Windows.
